title: Integration Ideas Summary
body_html:
Integration Ideas Summary

Webhook Integration: Consider implementing webhooks for real-time updates where applicable.

Data Collection: Use API to pull conversation data, and consider periodic polling with timestamps for efficiency.

Monitoring Changes: Implement timestamp checks or event-driven architecture to detect changes.

Optimization: Enhance API usage, optimize data retrieval, and explore automation to improve workflow.

Polling Interval: Pull data every 30 seconds to maintain up-to-date information without overloading.

These strategies aim to streamline OpenHands integration and ensure efficiency.
